title: tiruvaruL unadai
sahitya:
triruvaruL unadai nAn peravE dayai puruvAi tirupparamkunran tanil tigazhum enran murugA


anupallavi

  sharaNam enriDuvOrai sari nigharillAmal parivuDan pAlittu aruL puri umaiyanE


caraNam    arupaDai vIDuDaiyavA Ariru karamuDaiyavA karai puraL kaDal pOl karuNaip-perukkuDaiyavA
dharaNi engum pongum arum sIruDaiyavA sharaNam enrAl bhayam tarum taghaimai uDaiyavA
